title: nowPaper
summary: Beautiful wallpapers inspired by Google Now
developerAddress:
100 Grandville Ave SW Suite 203
Grand Rapids, MI 49503
description: Introducing nowPaper: An application designed to allow easy access to Google Now-inspired wallpapers. With nowPaper, you can apply beautiful wallpapers/backgrounds that are based on or replicate Google Now's stunning abstract landscapes and cities. The wallpapers are in created in Ultra HD (4K) and Full HD (1080p).Muzei support with automatic time-based cycling is also included! nowPaper has an extension for the extremely popular live-wallpaper app Muzei. This allows the included Google Now-inspired wallpapers to cycle based on time (corresponding to dawn, day, dusk, and night). With the Muzei extension, you can use 4K resolution wallpapers for select locations. That way you can fully utilize your QHD display. There is also an option to have nowPaper choose a random location each day, so you wake up to a fresh home screen every morning.Don't have Muzei? Get it here for free New designs (cities and landscapes) are consistently being designed and added.The Google Now-inspired wallpapers (nowPapers) were created by Alex Pasquarella at www.alexpasquarella.com
descriptionHTML:
Introducing nowPaper: An application designed to allow easy access to Google Now-inspired wallpapers. With nowPaper, you can apply beautiful wallpapers/backgrounds that are based on or replicate Google Now's stunning abstract landscapes and cities. The wallpapers are in created in Ultra HD (4K) and Full HD (1080p).


Muzei support with automatic time-based cycling is also included! nowPaper has an extension for the extremely popular live-wallpaper app Muzei. This allows the included Google Now-inspired wallpapers to cycle based on time (corresponding to dawn, day, dusk, and night). With the Muzei extension, you can use 4K resolution wallpapers for select locations. That way you can fully utilize your QHD display. There is also an option to have nowPaper choose a random location each day, so you wake up to a fresh home screen every morning.


Don't have Muzei? Get it here for free

New designs (cities and landscapes) are consistently being designed and added.

The Google Now-inspired wallpapers (nowPapers) were created by Alex Pasquarella at www.alexpasquarella.com
comments: Half As Much Left '-' Pretty Sure I Paid For This App & it was provided MUCH MORE.. NEW YORK, SAN FRANCISCO . AND MANY MORE REMOVED.. Are benefit to developer must have changed.. So we have been RIPPED OFF

Like the wallpapers but am disappointed because several wallpapers were removed several months ago with little to no explanation as to why. Furthermore, since then no new wall papers have been added to make up for this. If more papers are added I will happily revise this review.

Some nice wallpapers, but not good enough selection for a paid app. Also, only 1080p resolution on many papers, which is horrible as they have to be applied vertically this resulting in a totally un-sharp image when applied to anything other than a 720p screen.
Needs more variety. It's been years since anything new was added. Have grown bored with existing options and moved on.
Used to be better Pls add the ability to auto change scenes according to the time, and that the wallpapers are downloaded locally instead of having to get it online every time we wanna change
This app hasn't been updated for more than a year. No new wallpapers, and some of the old ones were removed. Any luck that the author is still interested in his offspring?
recentChanges: - Fix force close when trying to download wallpaper on Marshmallow by requesting Storage permission
